Application.Name: Oversight
Application.Author: Lordy
Application.Description: Must have. NOTE:test5 A minimalist auto-updating JukeBox for 'transient' collections. Provides an PVR type view when combined with nzbget and an automatic nzb downloader (tvnzb or torrentwatch) It also includes comprehensive post processing scripts for nzbget. This version is stable , however the beta version contains many fixes and enhancements and is the recommended version.

Application.Name: Oversight
Application.Author: Lordy
Application.Description: Hands free NMT jukebox. See stable release for full description. If upgrading you should create a new oversight.cfg from oversight.cfg.example. There are new settings for poster view. If the upgrade doesnt work please use the mini-installer to restore http://prodynamic.co.uk/nmt/installer/index.html Known Issues: oversight: The index may dissapear during delete operation. A rescan will bring it back.
Application.UsageInstructions: If you used oversight V1, please note the link is changed to http://[NMT_IP]:8883/oversight/oversight.cgi
Application.Changelog:
Jun 5 / 20090605-2BETA: catalog : Minor bug fix to tvscanning when mapping imdbid to tvdbid
20090706-1BETA unpak Fix reference to NZBOP_APPBIN for older nzbget 20090605-1BETA catalog : Fix bug for YAMJ multi-part naming convention Display scan progress. Get Season Posters from thetvdb.com then imdb Get Movie Posters from themoviedb.com / motechposters.com / imdb Search for imdblinks in online usenet nfo files. Removed deep search - not accurate enought Abbreviation Detection - eg ttscc , Grk , dh501 combined with usenet file search. Parsing and grouping of Big Brother UK format Better Grouping of Daily Shows and Unknown shows Can use locally stored posters.
Known Issues : Sample Deletions not working for some. Correct detection of law and order : svu [ enhance abbreviated search ] Reduce false positives further.
Coming Soon : Transmission integration / USB NAS support. Hide Show Rating Auto Box Set.
Mar14: unpak : Fix to delete sample files. Mar14: catalog : Fix for quoted files. Should solve some scanning issues people are having. Mar14: catalog : Fix multipart detection. CD01 Mar14: catalog : Detect when Epguides links to pilot episode on IMDB rather than series e.g "Ugly Betty". Mar07: catalog : Fix for short imdb ids (5 digit eg Simpsons) Mar05: oversight: Added Poster View Mar03: oversight: Update tool / unrolled db read loop Mar03: unpak : cross platform fix to awk regex May01: catalog : Split file detection fixed. May01: unpak : Cross platform unpak fixes. Another path bug fixed! Apr30: catalog : Better matching C.S.I to CSI ,aaf-sp.s13e07 unpak:Removed "which" command

Application.Name: TvNZB
Application.Author: Lordy
Application.Description: Automatically download TV oriented NZB files from RSS and feed to nzbget. Also provides NZBget scheduling.
Application.Changelog: 20090614-2: Oops removed some debug lines that broke downloads. 20090614-1: Fixed matching agaist titles with html escapes 20090613-1: Added configurable match limit. Re-Added Skip/Fast Forward 20090611-1: Bug fix - newzleech feed fixed again. 20090610-3: Bug fix - feed 0 caused segfault (but left code that stopped newzleech working) 20090610-1: Accept multiple RSS feeds. More robust nzbget peak scheduling 20090528-1: Work with nzbget from firmware or from CSI.

Application.Name: Zebedee
Application.Author: Lordy
Application.Description: Another GUI for nzbget that works in the browser or on the TV.
Application.Changelog: 20090610-1: Allow NZB upload via URL. Removed test pages as it adds extra maintenance effort and also seemed to confuse some users. 20090528-1: Work with nzbget from firmware or from CSI. TODO : Rewrite for better visibilty of completed, failed jobs.
